long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Puts a banner at the bottom of the page which says "I'D RATHER BE FISHING." For those who would rather be fishing.

Don't worry about it blocking your view either: If you move your mouse to the bottom of the window, the banner will conveniently drop out of sight and allow you to access everything at the bottom of the page.
